values: wow, its been awhile since ive updated this again lol, i think the last time was in february, now its march...damn alot has happened...in 2 days itll be me n taylors 1 month anniversary so thats pretty sweet, hes soo amazingly awesome! just got back from bein home for the weekend, that was fun got to see all my family and my aunt who is 4 months pregnant, im soo happy for her i cant wait to have a new cousin! i hope its a girl, but we'll know tomorrow! last weekend kit n i took a roadtrip to CT to bring her bf home, god that was soo much fun! can't wait to do it again lol hopefully it wont start snowing in ONLY deerfield again lol, crazy-ass new england! then the last week was just spent hangin out, doin some drinkin havin fun fpc stlye of course! sad news tho! as of tomorrow, a member of the mw3w crew will be gone forever as hes been suspended from the school cause this place blows!!!!  tear! ill miss ya hun and we are so gonna have some fun tonight! spring breaks comin up on the 19th tho so thatll be sweet cant wait to go home n see all of my friends, maybe go to the cape wit taylor, that'll be fun lol, well im out ill try to remember to update this shit again before april lol...pEaCe!!

wow, i havent updated this in sooooooo long!!! lol so much has happened. well prolly not really but at least im happy now, ive been back at school for a few weeks now with all my friends who are amazing! love ya guys!!! have a new bf , taylor, ly baby...so this v-day actually didnt suck! new classes are pretty good but my schedule was soo fucked up the first 2 weeks, still is actually..thanks fpc!  this school def sucks, but at least my friends and i can make it fun...drunk sledding anyone, wow i sooo dont remember that, wish i did tho lol. food still sucks but dinner is always fun, gotta love people people throwing stuff in my drinks that i havent finished, i still heart you tho drew...honeypants lol.....got my hair cut, thanks kit, you rock! its sooo cute i love it!! soon as i get pictures ill put one up here...im sooo hungry cant wait for drew n lindsay to get back from class so we can go eat!!! then with any luck itll be a pub night lol either that or lb n jon are breakin into the caf again lol, i cant believe you guys did that, love ya boys!  lol after we spent the afternoon rearranging jeff n lb's room. lol looks so much better tho!!!! like an actual room! so yeah i get to just sit here listenin to taylor and jeff play guitar and watch dave play mariokart...but at least its not zelda!!!! soo sick of that game, but the guitar playing is good lol love my rocker baby, n my boy jeff lol the heavy metal crew, all we need now is drew....crazy-ass motherfuckers!!!! well im out, ill add more later but right now im sick of typing....PEACE!!!!

oooh yeah!!!! back at home at FPC! missed this school sooo much! lol great fun partying since saturday night, lol aiming for a week long bday party!!! 19 on tuesday so thats sweet, just 2 years til 21 lol s'all good, it was a good night lol, not as good as it coulda been thanks to a dumbass friend lol still love ya tho taylor we'll make up for it...and jeff is hopefully gonna come visit this weekend, so thats a party lol!!!! miss ya hunnie, cant wait to see you!! now im chillin watchin people play video games lol, no classes the rest of the day! sah-weet! fairly bored but its okay, tonight will be fun lol, always is fun up here! guess im prolly gonna go pass out tho, im soooooo tired!!! dunno why tho but its fine...PEACE

4 EAST IS WHERE ITS AT!!!!!!!!!   lol chris, you're my hero! big pimpin up at F-P-C!!!

wow, so today started out okay other then the fact that it was like 5 degrees out!!!! lol way to cold to be allowed! so im doin okay all day today, hoping that i had finally gotten over shit and whatnot...so what happens? i go to the mall wit my cuzin to buy some under roos lol and who do i see walkin into the mall, of course fully knowing that im about to be walking into the same store that he just walked into....but bobby, and of course i see him as hes gettin onto the escalator that im about to get on, so now i get to feel like im stalking him or something, which im totally not considering id been planning on going to hot topic all day w/out knowing that he was going to the mall...and the awesome thing is...the kid keeps staring at me, like i cant see him..im trying to ignore him, but everytime i turn around, he (the kid who is apparently trying to erase the fact that i exist frm his memory) is staring at me..i mean i know i look good, but jesus, it just hurts even more ya know? like stop staring and come talk to me! honestly when i saw him, i almost broke down and started crying, but thatnks to my awesome cousin i didnt....but i was shaking so hard and couldnt stop for like 2 hours all because of him, god i thought i was finally over it again and then no..i hafta see him and it kills me.....i hate life

went up to fpc today to pay a bill, that was fun...ended up needing to get into my room so i hadta find lisa...on my way out i saw my friend jeff...moving out...he was gonna leave w/out telling anyone! wicked upset, but at least i got to bye!! got home around 4, now ive been sitting here doing absolutely nothing, bored and extremely tired cause i didnt go to bed til like 4am and i hadta wake up at 8:30...sucky, found out that i have mono, maybe thats why im tired....oh i doubt it, its just cause i dont sleep...now theryre tellin me to eat good and sleep but at this point i dont really feel like doing either, but thats a diff reason that i dont even want to get into right now other then to say that love is overrated.....talked to my boy jim, totally forgot today was his bday..feel horrible..HAPPY BIRTHDAY!! hunnie and im def gettin you a present so get over it lol now im doing nothing...maybe ill go to sleep, yeah right....guess ill sit here doing nothing, go watch tv or something...god i cant wait to get back to fpc away from everything here (cept for a few of you, i love ya) so much hurts rights now....i honestly cant even deal with it anymore....whateva tho i guess...im out...pz

my heart is breaking into a million pieces and my world is slowly crashing down all around me...i realize that this is all my fault, but its not like i meant for it to happen, how can they give up and shut it out so quickly? is it really that easy? god, why him? why now? i honestly think that its impossible for me to love and be loved...no matter what, i fuck it up...thank god for my cousin...i'll just live with her for the rest of my life lol fuck guys! it shouldnt hurt this much, im the one that did this, how did i let this happen? i just want to know one thing though..why the lies? he was happy with me...now all of a sudden hes saying that he wasnt? even i know that i had been happy, the love just seemed to fade, maybe it was the distance, maybe if i had gone to school closer to home, things would be okay...but i know he was happy, he cant lie, its all a lie...maybe everything is a lie, maybe im a lie...just one big fucking lie...

today i slept til 12:30...lol not unusal, then went out with my mom shopping, that was okay...ended up finally breaking down and talking to her, hadnt thought i could before...still kinda depressed but im a lil better now that ive talked to her about everything..then we went to target and got the new shadows fall cd, lol took me awhile, really wanted the green day cd, but they didnt have it..kinda pissed but oh well, ill try best buy i guess and then went to the taunton mall and returned some clothes at old navy but they wouldnt give me the money and i really dont like that store so my mom used the card and is going to give me the money so thats sweet...went to hot topic, lol i'd forgotten how much i love that store, found the cutest skirt, jeans and t-shirt (the shirt says im not with stupid anymore, lol i LOVE it) going back tomorrow to get them along with some other stuff from there and prolly american eagle and hollister, lol what a combination...its all good tho...im sooo excited to be going back to school on sunday, i cant wait to go back and see all my friends, i miss everyone soooooo much!! im really just hoping that it will take my mind off of everything thats causing me to be depressed cause ill be away from it and ill be with my friends that love me lol and will keep my mind off of "it" tomorrow im goin out with my mom again, gonna go get that stuff from hot topic, maybe then go down to the north attleboro mall so that should be fun, but for now, im going to sleep cause im wicked tired! goodnight!

Well today was my birthday party with my family because i wont see most of them before i leave for school on the 23rd. got some cool stuff, also got to watch the eagles kick ass lol...of course!!!!! after that kristy and i went to her grandmothers house for a bit to see how the weather was going to be, then when to TGIFridays to watch the Pats kick some serious ass!!!! lol GO PATRIOTS! gotta love 'em! super bowl here we come lol it was a great time...esp kristys lil surprise lol (sry hun, i know you hate surprises, but come on, you know this one was great!) know im sitting at home, talking to people, kinda upset about a few things...but i'll be okay, always okay...pretty much cant wait to get back to fpc, though i dont want to leave kristy lol she just got here!!!!! but then, maybe up there with everyone and everything to keep me occupied and distracted, the pain will go away, although i suppose, sometimes pain never goes away so who knows...god, now im sounding way to emo...but ya know what, someone ask me if i fuckin care...i honestly just want to get through the next few weeks w/out totally breaking down...possibly the next few months....

 ... I know what it's like when memories make you wince, and love letters read like obituaries, and photo albums are the books of the dead, I need no reminders, no more reminders, I'll forget the past and lay it to rest, if I had my way, I'd cut the calluses, off your breaking heart, if I could get past the sternum, cauterize those wounds with, every kiss I could give to you, I'm holding your heart in my hands, the reason it still beats, am I being too cryptic? am I being too obscure? am I being too cryptic? am I being too obscure? love kills, romance is dead, and I don't even trust myself, but I love you, and you can pull my wings apart, and pin me down under glass, until the end of days if it can help you, discover that we share the same pain, I just hope you write your thesis, before your subject is dead, no life after death ...

so today on AAF, caller #7 won tix to go see slipknot...n of course i wanna go sooooo bad....so i call..and im caller # 5...sooooo fuckin pissed, oh well..im still goin to the concert anyway..idc! ill just buy the tix....but neway, thats just one of the upcoming concerts im goin to (hopefully! lol)...

 Eighteen Visions ~ February 5th...Palladium
 local band, lol no name yet...February 12th...i think at the Sons of Italy Hall in Quincy, lol ill find out soon!
 Killswitch Engage, Senses Fail, The Used, My Chemical Romance...February 28th...Tsongas Arena
 Atreyu ~ March 5th...Palladium
 Hopesfall ~ March 8th...The Roxy
 Slipknot ~ March 15th...Tsongas Arena
 
so if anyone wants to go...let me know, im totally up for any of those concerts esp slipknon n atreyu

 tonight was cool, went out to eat with my cousin who just got here from michigan, woohoo lol, (course someone else was sposed to come too, betta have a damn good reason why he didnt pick up his cell!) lol we got so lost that we hadta ask a cop n he ended up havin us follow him there...lol we are the only 2 people who would have an escort to a bar in quincy!!! food was good n there was an awesome football game on, lol STL never had a chance!! gotta love vick n dunn....now im off to sleep, wicked tired! goodnight!
